info.title: Water Quality Service API
info.description: API for managing water quality monitoring data.

tags.name: WaterQualityService
tags.description: Operations related to water quality monitoring

post.description: Creates one or more new data points with their associated indicators.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request to create one or more new data points.

put.description: Updates one or more existing data points.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request to update one or more existing data points.

post.description: Deletes one or more data points. Can be soft or hard delete.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request to delete one or more entities by their IDs.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of data source schemas with filtering options.

parameters.name: options.limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of items to return per page.

parameters.name: options.offset
parameters.description: Number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set (for pagination).

parameters.name: options.sortBy
parameters.description: Field name to sort the results by (e.g., 'created_at', 'name').

parameters.name: options.sortDesc
parameters.description: Set to true to sort in descending order.

parameters.name: options.filters
parameters.description: Key-value pairs for specific field filtering. Values should correspond to google.protobuf.Value structure (e.g., {"email": "user@gmail.com"}).

parameters.name: options.includeDeleted
parameters.description: Set to true to include soft-deleted records in the results.

post.description: Creates a new data source schema definition.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request to create a new data source schema definition.

get.description: Retrieves a specific data source schema by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: UUID of the schema to retrieve.

put.description: Updates an existing data source schema definition.

parameters.name: schema.id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the schema (UUID format).

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of monitoring stations with filtering options.

parameters.name: options.limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of items to return per page.

parameters.name: options.offset
parameters.description: Number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set (for pagination).

parameters.name: options.sortBy
parameters.description: Field name to sort the results by (e.g., 'created_at', 'name').

parameters.name: options.sortDesc
parameters.description: Set to true to sort in descending order.

parameters.name: options.filters
parameters.description: Key-value pairs for specific field filtering. Values should correspond to google.protobuf.Value structure (e.g., {"email": "user@gmail.com"}).

parameters.name: options.includeDeleted
parameters.description: Set to true to include soft-deleted records in the results.

post.description: Creates one or more new monitoring stations.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request to create one or more new monitoring stations.

put.description: Updates one or more existing monitoring stations.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request to update one or more existing monitoring stations.

post.description: Deletes one or more monitoring stations. Can be soft or hard delete.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request to delete one or more entities by their IDs.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of data points for a specific station.

parameters.name: stationId
parameters.description: UUID of the station to list data points for.

parameters.name: options.limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of items to return per page.

parameters.name: options.offset
parameters.description: Number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set (for pagination).

parameters.name: options.sortBy
parameters.description: Field name to sort the results by (e.g., 'created_at', 'name').

parameters.name: options.sortDesc
parameters.description: Set to true to sort in descending order.

parameters.name: options.filters
parameters.description: Key-value pairs for specific field filtering. Values should correspond to google.protobuf.Value structure (e.g., {"email": "user@gmail.com"}).

parameters.name: options.includeDeleted
parameters.description: Set to true to include soft-deleted records in the results.

post.description: Streams a data file for processing and importing water quality data.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: A single message in the upload stream, containing either a metadata field or a data chunk. (streaming inputs)

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the schema was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the schema was last updated.

deletedAt.description: Timestamp when the schema was soft-deleted. Null if not deleted.

name.description: Name of the data source schema.

sourceIdentifier.description: Unique identifier for the source (e.g., URL, file pattern, API endpoint).

sourceType.description: Type of the data source (csv, json, excel, api, manual).

description.example: Monthly water quality reports from the Ministry of Environment monitoring stations.
description.description: Detailed description of the data source and its contents.

schemaDefinition.description: JSON structure defining the fields and their mappings to entities. Represents []FieldDefinition from Go entity.

schema.description: Defines the structure and mapping of an external data source.
schema.title: Data Source Schema

WaterQualityServiceUpdateDataSourceSchem.description: Request to update an existing data source schema definition.
WaterQualityServiceUpdateDataSourceSchem.title: Update Data Source Schema Request

limit.description: Maximum number of items to return per page.

offset.description: Number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set (for pagination).

sortBy.description: Field name to sort the results by (e.g., 'created_at', 'name').

sortDesc.description: Set to true to sort in descending order.

filters.description: Key-value pairs for specific field filtering. Values should correspond to google.protobuf.Value structure (e.g., {"email": "user@gmail.com"}).

includeDeleted.description: Set to true to include soft-deleted records in the results.

coreFilterOptions.description:
Represents common filtering, pagination, and sorting options.
Based on pkg/core/types/common.go FilterOptions struct.

totalItems.description: Total number of items matching the query criteria across all pages.

limit.description: The limit (page size) used for the current response.

offset.description: The offset (number of items skipped) used for the current response.

corePaginationInfo.description:
Represents common pagination metadata included in list responses.
Based on pkg/core/types/common.go PaginationResult struct (metadata fields only).
Specific list responses should include this alongside their repeated items field.

protobufNullValue.description:
`NullValue` is a singleton enumeration to represent the null value for the
`Value` type union.

 The JSON representation for `NullValue` is JSON `null`.

 - NULL_VALUE: Null value.

dataPoints.description: List of data points to create.

waterqualityCreateDataPointsRequest.description: Request to create one or more new data points.
waterqualityCreateDataPointsRequest.title: Create Data Points Request

dataPoints.description: List of created data points with system-generated fields populated.

waterqualityCreateDataPointsResponse.description: Contains details of the newly created data points.
waterqualityCreateDataPointsResponse.title: Create Data Points Response

waterqualityCreateDataSourceSchemaReques.description: Request to create a new data source schema definition.
waterqualityCreateDataSourceSchemaReques.title: Create Data Source Schema Request

schema.description: Created schema with system-generated fields populated.

waterqualityCreateDataSourceSchemaRespon.description: Contains the newly created data source schema.
waterqualityCreateDataSourceSchemaRespon.title: Create Data Source Schema Response

waterqualityCreateStationsRequest.description: Request to create one or more new monitoring stations.
waterqualityCreateStationsRequest.title: Create Stations Request

stations.description: List of created stations with system-generated fields populated.

waterqualityCreateStationsResponse.description: Contains details of the newly created monitoring stations.
waterqualityCreateStationsResponse.title: Create Stations Response

id.description: Unique identifier for the data point (UUID format).
id.title: Base fields inline

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the data point was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the data point was last updated.

deletedAt.description: Timestamp when the data point was soft-deleted. Null if not deleted.

monitoringTime.description: Timestamp when the water quality measurements were taken.
monitoringTime.title: DataPoint specific fields

wqi.description: Water Quality Index - a calculated value representing overall water quality.

stationId.description: Reference to the monitoring station UUID where the data was collected.

source.description: Source of the data (e.g., filename, API endpoint, sensor ID).

observationType.description: Type of observation (actual, interpolation, predicted, realtime_monitoring).

dataSourceSchemaId.description: Reference to the DataSourceSchema UUID used to process this data point.

features.description: List of specific water quality measurements/features associated with this data point.
features.title: Updated features field

waterqualityDataPoint.description: Represents a single water quality data collection event at a monitoring station.
waterqualityDataPoint.title: Data Point

name.description: Name of the feature (e.g., pH, DO, Temperature, Recommendations).

value.description: Numerical value of the feature measurement. Null if textual_value is used.

textualValue.description: Textual value for non-numeric features (e.g., recommendations, quality status). Null if value is used.

purpose.description: Purpose of this feature (prediction, display, analysis).

source.description: Source of this specific feature measurement (e.g., sensor ID, calculation method). Inherits from DataPoint source if empty.
source.title: No base entity fields (ID, CreatedAt etc.) as this is embedded

waterqualityDataPointFeature.description: Represents a single water quality measurement/feature within a DataPoint.
waterqualityDataPointFeature.title: Data Point Feature

waterqualityDataPointFeatureInput.description: Data required to define a feature within a DataPointInput.
waterqualityDataPointFeatureInput.title: Data Point Feature Input

monitoringTime.description: Timestamp when the water quality measurements were taken.

wqi.description: Water Quality Index - a calculated value representing overall water quality.

stationId.description: Reference to the monitoring station UUID where the data was collected.

source.description: Source of the data (e.g., filename, API endpoint, sensor ID).

features.description: Collection of individual water quality measurements/features associated with this data point.
features.title: Updated features field

waterqualityDataPointInput.description: Data required to create a new data point with optional feature indicators.
waterqualityDataPointInput.title: Data Point Input

id.description: Unique identifier for the schema (UUID format).

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the schema was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the schema was last updated.

deletedAt.description: Timestamp when the schema was soft-deleted. Null if not deleted.

name.description: Name of the data source schema.

sourceIdentifier.description: Unique identifier for the source (e.g., URL, file pattern, API endpoint).

sourceType.description: Type of the data source (csv, json, excel, api, manual).

description.example: Monthly water quality reports from the Ministry of Environment monitoring stations.
description.description: Detailed description of the data source and its contents.

schemaDefinition.description: JSON structure defining the fields and their mappings to entities. Represents []FieldDefinition from Go entity.

waterqualityDataSourceSchema.description: Defines the structure and mapping of an external data source.
waterqualityDataSourceSchema.title: Data Source Schema

name.description: Name of the data source schema.

sourceIdentifier.description: Unique identifier for the source (e.g., URL, file pattern, API endpoint).

sourceType.description: Type of the data source (csv, json, excel, api, manual).

description.example: Monthly water quality reports from the Ministry of Environment monitoring stations.
description.description: Detailed description of the data source and its contents.

schemaDefinition.description: JSON structure defining the fields and their mappings to entities.

waterqualityDataSourceSchemaInput.description: Data required to create a new data source schema definition.
waterqualityDataSourceSchemaInput.title: Data Source Schema Input

ids.description: List of entity UUIDs to delete.

hardDelete.description: If true, performs a permanent (hard) delete. If false or omitted, performs a soft delete.

waterqualityDeleteRequest.description: Request to delete one or more entities by their IDs.
waterqualityDeleteRequest.title: Delete Request

affectedCount.description: Number of entities that were successfully deleted.

waterqualityDeleteResponse.description: Contains information about the deletion operation.
waterqualityDeleteResponse.title: Delete Response

waterqualityGetDataSourceSchemaResponse.description: Contains the requested data source schema.
waterqualityGetDataSourceSchemaResponse.title: Get Data Source Schema Response

dataPoints.description: List of data points matching the filter criteria.

pagination.description: Pagination information including total count and current page.

waterqualityListDataPointsByStationRespo.description: Contains a paginated list of data points for a specific station.
waterqualityListDataPointsByStationRespo.title: List Data Points By Station Response

schemas.description: List of schemas matching the filter criteria.

pagination.description: Pagination information including total count and current page.

waterqualityListDataSourceSchemasRespons.description: Contains a paginated list of data source schemas.
waterqualityListDataSourceSchemasRespons.title: List Data Source Schemas Response

stations.description: List of stations matching the filter criteria.

pagination.description: Pagination information including total count and current page.

waterqualityListStationsResponse.description: Contains a paginated list of monitoring stations.
waterqualityListStationsResponse.title: List Stations Response

id.description: Unique identifier for the station (UUID format).
id.title: Base fields inline

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the station was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the station was last updated.

deletedAt.description: Timestamp when the station was soft-deleted. Null if not deleted.

country.description: Country where the station is located.

waterqualityStation.description: Represents a water quality monitoring station.
waterqualityStation.title: Station

name.title: No base fields needed for input typically

latitude.description: Latitude coordinate of the station (decimal degrees).

longitude.description: Longitude coordinate of the station (decimal degrees).

country.description: Country where the station is located.

location.description: Additional location details (city, region, water body name).

waterqualityStationInput.description: Data required to create a new monitoring station.
waterqualityStationInput.title: Station Input

dataPoints.description: List of data points with updated fields. Each must include ID.

waterqualityUpdateDataPointsRequest.description: Request to update one or more existing data points.
waterqualityUpdateDataPointsRequest.title: Update Data Points Request

waterqualityUpdateDataPointsResponse.description: Contains details of the updated data points.
waterqualityUpdateDataPointsResponse.title: Update Data Points Response

waterqualityUpdateDataSourceSchemaRespon.description: Contains the updated data source schema.
waterqualityUpdateDataSourceSchemaRespon.title: Update Data Source Schema Response

stations.description: List of stations with updated fields. Each must include ID.

waterqualityUpdateStationsRequest.description: Request to update one or more existing monitoring stations.
waterqualityUpdateStationsRequest.title: Update Stations Request

waterqualityUpdateStationsResponse.description: Contains details of the updated monitoring stations.
waterqualityUpdateStationsResponse.title: Update Stations Response

message.description: Summary message about the upload processing.

recordsFailed.description: Number of records that failed to process.

dataSourceSchemaId.description: ID of schema used or created during processing.

errors.description: List of errors encountered during processing.

waterqualityUploadDataResponse.description: Response after processing an uploaded file.
waterqualityUploadDataResponse.title: Upload Data Response

filename.description: Name of the file being uploaded (sent usually as the first message).

fileType.description: Type of the file (sent usually after filename).

dataChunk.description: Chunk of binary file data (sent in subsequent messages).
dataChunk.title:
Optional: Consider adding data_source_schema_id here if needed
 string data_source_schema_id = 4 [(...)]

waterqualityUploadRequest.description: A single message in the upload stream, containing either a metadata field or a data chunk.
waterqualityUploadRequest.title: Upload Request (Streaming, Flat Oneof)
